descriptions.title: Destruction Ritual Using a Magic Wheel or Machine
descriptions.content:
Example Texts

  • ‘Khrul ‘khor chen mo brgyad 
  • Dgra bo smyo ba dang rims dbab par byed pa’i ‘phrul ‘khor ma he’i zhal can drag po’i ngar dbyangs 
  • Gshin rje gshes kyi ‘khrul ‘khor ‘phrin las grub pa
  • Mnan pa ‘khor lo nag po (?) 
  • Mkhar do ‘phrul ‘khor rituals
